objects.specification: A large rectangular dark gray matte floor covering 10 by 6 meters with a smooth, non-reflective surface, designed to provide a neutral and professional base for the fair booth environment.
A tall white wall standing 3 meters high and 10 meters wide with a smooth matte finish, forming the front boundary of the booth and presenting a clean, minimalistic fair booth aesthetic.
A tall white wall standing 3 meters high and 10 meters wide with a smooth matte finish, forming the rear boundary of the booth and maintaining a cohesive minimalistic look.
A tall white wall standing 3 meters high and 6 meters deep with a narrow profile of 0.1 meters, forming the left boundary of the booth with a sleek, matte finish.
A tall white wall standing 3 meters high and 6 meters deep with a narrow profile of 0.1 meters, forming the right boundary of the booth with a sleek, matte finish.
A realistic demo car model with bright red glossy paint, smooth aerodynamic curves, well-defined tires and windows, designed as a modern sedan approximately 4.5 meters long and 2 meters wide.
A sturdy rectangular platform with a dark gray metal finish, slightly larger than the car footprint, featuring clean edges and a minimalistic modern design to elevate the vehicle.
A vertical banner stand with a slim metal support pole and stable rectangular base, featuring vibrant car-related graphics printed on seamless fabric, height 2 meters.
A vertical banner stand with a slim metal support pole and stable rectangular base, featuring vibrant car-related graphics printed on seamless fabric, height 2 meters.
A vertical banner stand with a slim metal support pole and stable rectangular base, featuring vibrant car-related graphics printed on seamless fabric, height 2 meters.
A vertical banner stand with a slim metal support pole and stable rectangular base, featuring vibrant car-related graphics printed on seamless fabric, height 2 meters.
A modern information desk with smooth curved corners, complementing gray and white color theme, ergonomic form, 1.5 meters wide, and an open front for visitor interaction.
A modern information desk with smooth curved corners, complementing gray and white color theme, ergonomic form, 1.5 meters wide, and an open front for visitor interaction.
An elongated thin cylinder light fixture with white housing, designed to cast diffuse and even illumination across the demo car below.
An elongated thin cylinder light fixture with white housing, designed to cast diffuse and even illumination across the demo car below.
An elongated thin cylinder light fixture with white housing, designed to cast diffuse and even illumination across the demo car below.
A decorative spotlight fixture with a sleek white housing, angled on a slim stand to accentuate booth elements with focused accent lighting.
